## 🔍 Type of Change

<!-- Mark the relevant option with an 'x' -->

- [ ] 🐛 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] ✨ New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] 💥 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] 📚 Documentation update (changes to documentation only)
- [ ] 🎨 Style/UI changes (changes that affect the visual design)
- [ ] ♻️ Code refactoring (changes that neither fix a bug nor add a feature)

- [ ] ♿ Accessibility improvement

## ✅ Pre-submission Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation as needed
- [ ] I have added/updated Storybook stories for new/modified components
- [ ] I have updated type definitions if applicable
- [ ] README.md or other relevant docs have been updated

### Quality Assurance

- [ ] Content validation passes (`npm run test:content`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`npm run check:types`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Preflight checks pass (`npm run preflight`)

### Accessibility

- [ ] New/modified components are keyboard accessible
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards
- [ ] Screen reader testing completed (if applicable)
- [ ] Focus management is handled properly
- [ ] ARIA labels/descriptions added where needed

### Performance

- [ ] Changes don't negatively impact bundle size significantly
- [ ] No unnecessary re-renders introduced
- [ ] Images are optimized (if applicable)
- [ ] No performance regressions detected

### Content & Academic Integrity

- [ ] I have not modified biographical or research content without approval
- [ ] Academic information remains accurate and factual
- [ ] No unauthorized changes to publications or research details
